thread.title: Lady Gaga Makes Blorange Hair Look Rocker-Chic at the Grammys
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga Makes Blorange Hair Look Rocker-Chic at the Grammys

author: Emily Orofino
title: Lady Gaga Makes Blorange Hair Look Rocker-Chic at the Grammys
text:
Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Lady Gaga Makes Blorange Hair Look Rocker-Chic at the Grammys 
Just a week after her incredible Super Bowl appearance , Lady Gaga is back mesmerizing us all again with her boundary-pushing beauty style at the Grammys . First, she seems to have just gotten a new tattoo to pay tribute to her performance with Metallica. She also decided to dye her hair the hottest new shade: blorange. 
Her platinum-blond strands featured the signature tones of the trendy hue — pink, red, and orange – all melted together for a gorgeous yet edgy mane masterpiece. She wore her hair pulled up into a high ponytail styled in messy, beachy waves. Gaga topped off the stunning style with a strong red lip and red glittery eye shadow that reminded us of her makeup from the 2016 Super Bowl . Stay tuned for more details on how her glam team created her look! 
Keep reading to see all angles of her new colorful strands, then learn how to get blorange hair yourself here .
